attributes.action: Stop local councils allowing Illegal flags/regalia to be flown/worn on Republican Marches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
IRA parades in Glasgow and surrounding areas are increasingly being allowed to carry flags/banners and regalia which is deemed illegal.

There is legislation that deems the support of terrorism to be illegal in the UK but continually this is being flouted by the parade organisers and bands.

The local council and police force come down heavy on other parades and what they fly and wear but seems Republican parades can do what they want.

Some examples of illegal regalia/flags, The Starry Plough Flag, a flag which represents the old IRA and is flown by IRA sympathisers today. The Sunburst flag which represents the IRA of today. Bands named after convicted terrorists with there names and badges emblazon on there drums and uniforms.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
